title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Workshop for Open Badge Learning Guidelines Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can establish open badge design plans by applying the six stages of the ASSURE Model (Analyze Learners, State Objectives, Select Media, Utilize Media, Require Learner Participation, Evaluate and Revise)
Learners can synthesize peer expert feedback and experience consensus-building processes using the fuzzy Delphi technique
Learners can produce digital badge prototype designs and evaluation materials using smartphone-based tools (e.g., Google Forms, Padlet)
Learners can develop open badge assessment rubrics tailored to language profession specializations (medical/legal/technical interpretation)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
